title: Enhanced Disease Results: Treatment, Fertilizer & Farmer-Help Components

requirements.summary: Add Fertilizer Recommendations section to disease result view
acceptanceCriteria: A clearly labeled 'Fertilizer Recommendations' section appears in the result view after disease detection.
Each fertilizer item shows its name and application guidance.
Styling uses the existing earthy green and amber color tokens and matches the DiseaseResult component's visual style.

file_operations.description: Add a Fertilizer Recommendations section after the treatment steps section. Display each fertilizer from the disease.fertilizers array as a styled card or list item. Use earthy green and amber color tokens from the existing theme (e.g., bg-emerald-50, text-amber-800, border-green-200) to match the agricultural aesthetic. Render the section only when fertilizers data is available.

requirements.summary: Add Prevention Tips section with scannable checklist-style display
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Prevention Tips' section is rendered in the disease result view.
Each tip is displayed as a separate item with a visual indicator (icon or bullet).
Section is only shown when prevention tips data is available.

file_operations.description: Add a Prevention Tips section rendering the disease.preventionTips array. Display each tip as a checklist-style item with a leaf or checkmark icon (use lucide-react icons such as CheckCircle or Leaf). Style consistently with the earthy theme using green accent colors. Only render when preventionTips data is available.

requirements.summary: Display Seasonal & Weather Advisory card in disease result view
acceptanceCriteria: A 'Seasonal Advisory' card is displayed in the result view showing the seasonal advice text.
Card is styled consistently with the agricultural theme.

file_operations.description: Add a Seasonal & Weather Advisory card that displays the disease.seasonalAdvice text field. Style as a distinct card using earthy green and amber tones (e.g., bg-amber-50, border-amber-200, text-green-900) to highlight the seasonal guidance. Only render when seasonalAdvice data is available.

requirements.summary: Display Disease Severity & Impact summary panel with color-coded badge
acceptanceCriteria: The result view displays a severity badge color-coded by level (e.g., green for Low, amber for Moderate, red for High/Critical).
Yield impact description is displayed beneath or alongside the severity badge.

file_operations.description: Add a Disease Severity & Impact summary panel that renders the disease.severityLevel as a color-coded badge (green for Low, amber for Moderate, red for High/Critical using existing theme colors like bg-green-100/text-green-800, bg-amber-100/text-amber-800, bg-red-100/text-red-800). Display the disease.yieldImpact text beneath or alongside the badge. Only render when severity and impact data are available.

requirements.summary: Add Quick Action Tips banner with urgent styling to disease result view
acceptanceCriteria: Quick actions are rendered as a visually distinct callout or chip group in the result view.
Styling uses amber/warning tones to convey urgency, consistent with the existing theme.

file_operations.description: Add a Quick Action Tips banner at the top of the disease result view (before other sections) that renders the disease.quickActions array. Display as a prominent callout box or chip group using amber/warning tones (e.g., bg-amber-100, border-amber-300, text-amber-900) to convey urgency. Use icons such as AlertCircle or Zap from lucide-react. Only render when quickActions data is available.
